name: Pickup Artist Trouble
description:
Alex is a pickup artist who scams single, lonely young men for money. Now he created a mob that is coming after him. They took his books and scattered them around different locations. Help Alex get his books back so that he can find success while scamming more men.

This game has a total of five levels. In each level, the player has to collect eight books to get to the ending. The levels range from forests to mountains. The player must get away from the men and women who want to take the money he got by scamming them.
